citeinfo.title: FACILITY_Schools
citeinfo.othercit: Suggested bibliographic reference: RIGIS, 2008. Schools; schools08. Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System, URL: http://www.rigis.org, Environmental Data Center, University of Rhode Island, Kingston, Rhode Island (last date accessed: 14 October 2014).

citeinfo.title: Rhode Island Department of Health Database

descript.abstract: Location and contact information for public and private schools from the preschool through the university level in Rhode Island as listed by Rhode Island Department of Education for school year 2008.The intention of this dataset was to provide an overview of school's data for the entire state. Additional information pertinent to the state is also available from the Rhode Island Department of Education www.ride.ri.gov.
descript.purpose: Locations of schools throughout Rhode Island.
descript.supplinf: The intention of this dataset was to provide an overview of school's data for the entire state. Additional information pertinent to the state is also available from the Rhode Island Department of Education www.ride.ri.gov.

idinfo.useconst:

Please acknowledge both RIGIS and the primary producer(s) of this dataset in any derived products. Versions of the RIGIS logo suitable for both printed and web-based products are available at http://www.rigis.org/logos.

dataqual.complete: Considered complete within RI borders for all schools for school year 2008

horizpa.horizpar: Estmated accuracy based on 1-5000 scale RIGIS 2003-2004 orthophotogaphy. Assumed accuracy 10-15 feet by national map accuracy standards

qhorizpa.horizpae: positions were determined primarily from building location on orthophotos.

srcinfo.srccontr: road centerlines with address ranges were used for assit verification of school sites
Buildings as seen on the photos as to determine posititon of schools
RI e911 building point location with address used to verify school location

procstep.procdesc: Using the addresses of the schools provided by the RIDE website, each school across the state was mapped and positoned using the aid of orthophotography to veiw actual school building sites from above. Assisting in the process were the type codes of the e911 sites across the state which clearly indicated a building as being a school. Also using Teleatlas road center line database addresses deetermined to aid in placing school sites.
Updated Point of Contact information for this dataset from "RIGIS Coordinator" to "Shane White."

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

attr.attrdef: The zip code of the school.

attr.attrdefs: Based on the grade levels each school has.

attr.attrdef: The town the school is located in.
The phone number of the school.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The fax number of the school.
date of last school update - month-day

edom.edomvd: Public, non-profit educational institutions. The multi-purpose educational collaborative provides special education programs to its member school districts .
A public school operated independently of the local school board, often with a curriculum and educational philosophy different from the other schools in the system.
